channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Uneven paving slabs, 1st December
item.description:
There is a uneven paving slab, and my wife tripped on it and hut her face badly. Please fix ASAP. It's by the white wall of the nursery, near the sign with "10J0550" on it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westcombe Park Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car seat discarded on footpath, 1st December
item.description:
An old car seat has been dumped/discarded on the pavement, outside Barham Court, Church Lane, Bromley, BR2 8LA. It has been there for several days now. It is a H&S risk to pedestrians, potentially a trip/fall hazard, particularly at night. Please can it be removed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Lane, Bromley Common, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
